strapiEvent.name: Inaugural Mardi Gras in the Garden District
strapiEvent.location: Botanical Garden of the Ozarks - Fayetteville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
The Krewe of Hortus invites you to our Inaugural “Mardi Gras in the Garden District” for a night of fun, food, and libations – complete with card games, prize drawings, music, and more! Prizes include a trip to NOLA for two, a private dinner cooked by Maudie Schmitt of Cafe Rue Orleans, and a special “Brunch & Bubbles” experience at Ella’s Table at the Inn at Carnall Hall. 

Your ticket includes a Cajun-inspired buffet dinner, adult beverages and sparkling waters, and $500 in playing money!

$125
